topic.title: HPE Helion Public Cloud CLI Software for Windows PowerShell: Working with Meta-Data

body.p: When required, you have the ability to store user defined meta-data along with the objects placed within a Container. This is accomplished with the set-metadata cmdlet. Input values for this parameter are a series of one to many key value pairs. Each Key Value pair must be enclosed in quotes and separated by the Pipe (|) character. Individual Key Values Pairs are delimited by a comma. For example..
In addition, you can also see how one would view meta-data on an existing object with the Get-MetaData command.
